A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I disliked most everything about this movie. The story is poor to say the least and littered with plot holes. The First Order reigns supreme with no discussion why even despite just losing Starkiller Base. It's leadership is nothing more than blundering buffoons and frankly the Resistance is about the same. Luke Skywalker was reduced to a moron and was easily beaten by Rey in a stupid stick battle. Got to see Yoda! Overall shame for the franchise.
